search_results.snippet:
SLAV TO THE GRIND: This short story writer got his law degree from the Univ. of 
Prague in 1906; that's "Mr. Depressing, Esq.", my doomed friend.
search_results.title: Jeopary Questions page 332 - CUSTER'S LAST STAND ...
